data.oai_dc:dc: Landscape Position Project: Vertical Lake Profiles

Parameters characterizing the chemical limnology and spatial attributes of 45 lakes were surveyed as part of the Landscape Position Project. Parameters are measured at or close to the deepest part of the lake. A vertical profile of temperature, dissolved oxygen, and conductivity are collected at 1 meter incrementsSampling Frequency: generally monthly for one summer, for some lakes, one or two samples in one summerNumber of sites: 45
North Temperate Lakes - LTER|dissolved oxygen|water temperature|conductance|conductivity
